gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 128, Timberwolves 125
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Timberwolves, 128-125. Miles Bridges recorded 28 points, five rebounds, and two assists for the Hornets, with Brandon Miller adding 27 points (3-4 3PM) and three rebounds in the victory. Karl-Anthony Towns tallied a career-high 62 points and 10 3PM along with 8 rebounds for the Timberwolves in the defeat. The Hornets improve to 10-31, while the Timberwolves fall to 30-13.
